sourceDesc.p: Search terms extracted from the following text(s):

bibl.title: The cabinet: containing entertaining selections, from new books of merit, in prose and verse. Ornamented with five elegant engravings.
bibl.publisher: Eighteenth Century Collections Online. Gale. University of Pittsburgh Libraries.
bibl.note: Prose and verses in reflection of the journey of Captain Wallis around the Globe

bibl.author: Courtenay, John.
bibl.title: An epistle (moral and philosophical) from an officer at Otaheite. To Lady Gr*s**n*r. With notes, critical and historical.
bibl.publisher: Eighteenth Century Collections Online. Gale. University of Pittsburgh Libraries
bibl.note: An epistle going more indepth about the Captain Wallis adventure in Otaheite

bibl.title: The Adventurer, by Dr. Hawksworth. Complete in one volume.
bibl.note: Good description of Hawksworth journey, Volume 1

bibl.author: Darwin, Erasmus.
bibl.title: The botanic garden. Part II. Containing the loves of the plants. A poem. With philosophical notes.
bibl.note: A more in depth idea to the subject matter of the Mimosa.

item.note: Too broad even with 1770-1800 time period and just with literature. 301 hits.
